abstract: When I am making lists in Microsoft Word, the program automatically capitalizes the first letter of each word when I press the return key. How can I make it stop doing this?

lead_paragraph: Q. When I am making lists in Microsoft Word, the program automatically capitalizes the first letter of each word when I press the return key. How can I make it stop doing this so I don’t have to go back and retype it in lowercase?
